product_name: CygoLite ExpiliOn 680 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: CygoLite ExpiliOn 680 USB front bike light puts a small-yet-powerful 680-lumen beam atop your handlebar for compact and easy illumination for bike commuting, trail riding or evening cruises. Superbright Cree LED puts out a powerful maximum of 680 lumens and is paired with precise optics for a beam pattern that's optimized for cycling. Aluminum bezel helps protect light and improves durability; water-resistant design protects light from inclement conditions. 4 constant lighting modes: boost, high, medium and low. Four special lighting modes: 2-in-1 SteadyPulse(TM), day flash, walking and S.O.S. Run times vary between 2.3 hrs. (boost) and 22 hrs. (day flash). SteadyPulse illumination mode combines steady brightness with an alerting flash, letting you see what's ahead of you while simultaneously letting others know your presence. Removable, quick-release lithium ion battery stick can be charged via computer USB port or an electrical outlet; charge time of 5 hrs. Illuminated control button features built-in power indicators for easy reference and access; includes low battery and charging status indicators. Quick-release mount on the CygoLite ExpiliOn 680 USB light fits 25.4 - 31.8mm handlebars. CygoLite ExpiliOn 680 USB bike light comes with a battery stick, USB cable, wall charger and handlebar mount.
short_description: CygoLite ExpiliOn 680 USB front bike light puts a small-yet-powerful 680-lumen beam atop your handlebar for compact and easy illumination for bike commuting, trail riding or evening cruises.
